components.description: Creates a new signed token containing issued date, subject, audience, expiration and claims.The supported value types for claims are: String, Date, Long, Double, Boolean and Integer.

input.description: The component input is used to evaluate the dynamic values provided for the token claims.

output.description: A new signed token containing issued date, configured subject, audience, expiration and claims.

properties.name: configuration
properties.description: The configuration for the JWT token.

objectProperties.name: issuer
objectProperties.description: The name of the issuer of the JWT token.

objectProperties.name: algorithm
objectProperties.description: The algorithm to be used to sign and verify the JWT token.

objectProperties.name: secret
objectProperties.description: The secret key to be used to sign and verify the JWT token.

properties.name: subject
properties.description: The optional value to be assigned to the subject claim.

properties.name: audience
properties.description: The optional value to be assigned to the audience claim.

properties.name: claims
properties.description: The JWT claims to be associated with the token.

components.description: The Verify Token component verifies that the input token is correctly signed. The component returns false if the algorithm stated in the token's header it's not equal to the one defined in the JWT configuration or the signature is invalid or the token has expired or a the claim contained a different value than the expected one otherwise true.

input.description: The component input is used to evaluate the dynamic value provided for the JWT token property.

output.description: False if the algorithm stated in the token's header it's not equal to the one defined in the JWT configuration or the signature is invalid or the token has expired or a the claim contained a different value than the expected one otherwise true.

properties.name: configuration
properties.description: The configuration for the JWT token.

objectProperties.name: issuer
objectProperties.description: The name of the issuer of the JWT token.

objectProperties.name: algorithm
objectProperties.description: The algorithm to be used to sign and verify the JWT token.

objectProperties.name: secret
objectProperties.description: The secret key to be used to sign and verify the JWT token.

properties.name: token
properties.description: The JWT token to be verified.
